description.zh: Dashy 是一个开源的仪表盘项目，用于将自托管服务集中管理，通过单一界面访问。它提供了一个可定制、用户友好的主页，用于管理和监控应用程序，支持实时状态检查、小组件、主题切换和多语言选项。Dashy 可通过 Docker、云平台或源码部署，非常适合个人或团队用于管理家庭实验室或企业级服务。
description.en: Dashy is an open-source dashboard that helps you organize self-hosted services by making them accessible from a single interface. It provides a customizable, user-friendly homepage to manage and monitor your applications, with support for real-time status checks, widgets, themes, and multi-language options. Dashy can be deployed via Docker, cloud platforms, or from source, making it ideal for personal or team use in managing homelab or enterprise services.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 集中访问所有自托管服务
- 轻量级、响应式且高度可定制的用户界面
- 活跃维护，定期更新并添加新功能
- 注重隐私，无追踪或外部依赖
- 支持多种部署方式，包括 Docker、云平台和源码安装

## 功能列表:

- 支持多页面管理
- 对应用程序/链接进行实时状态监控
- 可显示自托管服务动态内容的小组件
- 支持即时搜索及自定义快捷键和键盘操作
- 内置多种颜色主题，并支持自定义 CSS
- 多种图标选项，包括 Font-Awesome、表情符号和 Favicon
- 可选的身份验证功能，支持多用户访问和 SSO 登录
- 支持超过 10 种语言的本地化
- 提供加密云备份与恢复功能
- 支持工作区视图和极简视图
- 可配置的启动方式（新标签页、弹窗、剪贴板等）
- 布局、显示内容、行为等均可自定义
- 支持全屏背景图和自定义 HTML 页脚
- 基于 YAML 的配置文件，并提供可视化配置界面
- 体积小巧，支持 PWA 实现基础离线访问
- 完全免费且开源
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Centralized access to all self-hosted services
- Lightweight, responsive, and fully customizable UI
- Actively maintained with regular updates and new features
- Privacy-focused, with no tracking or external dependencies
- Easy deployment options including Docker, cloud, and source

## Features:

- Support for multiple pages
- Real-time status monitoring for apps/links
- Widgets to display dynamic content from self-hosted services
- Instant search with customizable hotkeys and keyboard shortcuts
- Built-in color themes and support for custom CSS
- Multiple icon options including Font-Awesome, emojis, and favicons
- Optional authentication with multi-user access and SSO support
- Multi-language support with over 10 translations
- Encrypted cloud backup and restore functionality
- Workspace and minimal views for different use cases
- Configurable app launch methods (new tab, modal, clipboard, etc.)
- Customizable layout, visibility, and behavior settings
- Full-screen background image and HTML footer options
- Easy YAML-based configuration with UI editor
- Small bundle size and PWA support for offline access
- 100% free and open-source
